full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Microfilm Scanner

**Title:** B8299-230080, Microfilm Scanner

**Reference Number:** WS3787200989-Doc3787240203

**Solicitation Number:** WS3787200989

**Publication Date:** December 12, 2022

**Closing Date:** January 4, 2023 at 14:00:00

The Department of Immigration, Refugee and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) is seeking proposals for the supply and delivery of microfilm scanners.

**Background:**
The IRCC has a requirement for four microfilm scanners with an estimated optional quantity of two units. The preferred delivery date is January 31, 2023. All deliverables must be delivered by March 31, 2023.

**Specifications:**
The microfilm scanners must be delivered to 365 Laurier Ave. West, Ottawa ON K1P 5K2.

**Trade Agreements:**
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries or requests for clarification, please contact Katie Wong, Contract Manager, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) at katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14874549?extsite=MTQ4NzQ1NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This is the formal tender announcement for the microfilm scanner procurement. Please read the notice carefully and submit your proposal before the closing date.
**Note:** The projected contract duration is from the expected contract start date (None) to the expected contract end date (March 31, 2024).
